name: Wild Ink
description:
Playing instructions:-

1.)  This is a simple 2P pen fight game.

2.) Use your old school tactics and knock your opponent down :-

     a.)  HEAD :- A sharp push at the head of your pen.

     b.) TAIL :- A sharp push at the tail / bottom of your pen.

     c.) stroke :- A sideways (right side) push to your pen (defensive )

     d.) b-stroke (back stroke) :- A sideways (left side) push to your pen(defensive)
